snippet: With sanctions contributing to major protests in Iran, officials have drawn up a plan to defuse the nuclear crisis with the West, but it requires many concessions.
abstract: Iranian officials have begun to describe a plan to defuse the nuclear crisis with the West by gradually suspending production of uranium that would be easiest for them to convert into a nuclear weapon; plan requires so many concessions by the West that American officials have dismissed it as unworkable
lead_paragraph: With sanctions contributing to major protests in Iran, officials have drawn up a plan to defuse the nuclear crisis with the West, but it requires many concessions.

headline.seo: Iranians Offer 9-Step Plan to End Nuclear Crisis
headline.main: Iran Offers Plan, Dismissed by U.S., on Nuclear Crisis
headline.print_headline: Iranians Offer Plan to End Nuclear Crisis
